name: DxChain
description: DxChain is the worldâ€™s first decentralized big data and machine learning network powered by a computing-centric blockchain. In other words, DxChain is a public chain, aims to design a platform to solve computation of big data in a decentralized environment. For simplicity, we could use DxChain to store and trade big data, so as to make data more valuable with the computation.
